h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Beast Buddha Location
content: The Beast Buddha is dropped randomly from any Dual-Blade Monk in The New West. The best place to farm them is at the entrance of New Thunderclap Temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Beast_Buddha.md', within the main section titled 'Beast Buddha', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Beast Buddha Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Beast Buddha is dropped randomly from any Dual-Blade Monk in The New West. The best place to farm them is at the entrance of New Thunderclap Temple.
